document_name: Removing Barriers to Increase Investment in Energy Efficiency in Public Buildings_Initiation Plan

outputs.output_descr: The objective of this work under this project preparation grant will be to prepare and submit the package of documentation to the GEF Secretariat. The full package of documentation will include a UNDP project document, a GEF Request for CEO Endorsement, a GEF Tracking Tool, an Environmental and Social Screening Procedure (ESSP), and co-financing letters.

project_descr: Removing barriers to increase investment in energy efficiency in public buildings in Ukraine
